verses.text: I will \w sing|strong="H7891"\w* of \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* and \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*: unto thee, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, will I \w sing|strong="H2167"\w*.

I will behave myself \w wisely|strong="H7919"\w* in a \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*. O when wilt thou \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto me? I will \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* my \w house|strong="H1004"\w* with a \w perfect|strong="H8537"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*.

I will \w set|strong="H7896"\w* no \w wicked|strong="H1100"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w* before mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: I \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* the \w work|strong="H6213"\w* of them that turn \w aside|strong="H7750"\w*; \add it\add* shall not \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* to me.\f + \fr 101.3 \ft wicked…: Heb. thing of Belial\f*
A \w froward|strong="H6141"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* shall \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* from me: I will not \w know|strong="H3045"\w* a \w wicked|strong="H7451"\w* \add person\add*.

Whoso \w privily|strong="H5643"\w* \w slandereth|strong="H3960"\w* his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, him will I cut \w off|strong="H6789"\w*: him that hath an \w high|strong="H1362"\w* \w look|strong="H5869"\w* and a \w proud|strong="H7342"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* will not I \w suffer|strong="H3201"\w*.

Mine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \add shall be\add* upon the \w faithful|strong="H0539"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, that they may \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* with me: he that \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* in a \w perfect|strong="H8549"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, he shall \w serve|strong="H8334"\w* me.\f + \fr 101.6 \ft in a…: or, perfect in the way\f*

He that \w worketh|strong="H6213"\w* \w deceit|strong="H7423"\w* shall not \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* my \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: he that \w telleth|strong="H1696"\w* \w lies|strong="H8267"\w* shall not \w tarry|strong="H3559"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.\f + \fr 101.7 \ft shall not tarry: Heb. shall not be established\f*

I will \w early|strong="H1242"\w* \w destroy|strong="H6789"\w* all the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; that I may cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* all \w wicked|strong="H0205"\w* \w doers|strong="H6466"\w* from the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
